Description:
Model
Brand: GIGABYTE
Model: Z790 UD AC


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Supports 13th / 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold, Celeron Processors


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel Z790


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: Support for DDR5 7600(O.C.) /7400(O.C.) /7200(O.C.) /7000(O.C.) /6800(O.C.) /6600(O.C.) / 6400(O.C.) / 6200(O.C.) / 6000(O.C.) / 5800(O.C.) / 5600(O.C.) / 5400(O.C.) / 5200(O.C.) / 4800 / 4000 memory modulesDual channel memory architectureSupport for ECC Un-buffered DIMM 1Rx8/2Rx8 memory modules (operate in non-ECC mode)Support for non-ECC Un-buffered DIMM 1Rx8/2Rx8/1Rx16 memory modulesSupport for Extreme Memory Profile (XMP) memory modules
Maximum Memory Supported: 192GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express x16 slot, supporting PCIe 5.0 and running at x16 (PCIEX16)* For optimum performance, if only one PCI Express graphics card is to be installed, be sure to install it in the PCIEX16 slot.
PCI Express 4.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express x16 slot, supporting PCIe 4.0 and running at x4 (PCIEX4)
PCI Express 3.0 x16: 2 x PCI Express x16 slots, supporting PCIe 3.0 and running at x1 (PCIEX1_1, PCIEX1_4)
PCI Express x1: 2 x PCI Express x1 slots, supporting PCIe 3.0 and running at x1 (PCIEX1_2, PCIEX1_3)


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 6 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: CPU:1 x M.2 connector (Socket 3, M key, type 22110/2280 PCIe 4.0 x4/x2 SSD support) (M2A_CPU)Chipset:2 x M.2 connectors (Socket 3, M key, type 2280 PCIe 4.0 x4/x2 SSD support) (M2Q_SB, M2P_SB)
SATA RAID: RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5, and RAID 10 support for SATA storage devices
Additional RAID Controller: RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5, and RAID 10 support for NVMe SSD storage devices


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek Audio CODECHigh Definition Audio
Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: Realtek 2.5GbE LAN chip
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps
Wireless LAN: Intel Wi-Fi AC 9560WIFI a, b, g, n, ac, supporting 2.4/5 GHz Dual-BandSupport for 11ac 160MHz wireless standard and up to 1.73 Gbps data rate*Actual data rate may vary depending on environment and equipment.
Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.1


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x USB Type-C port, with USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 support1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port (red)4 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports4 x USB 2.0/1.1 ports2 x SMA antenna connectors (1T1R)1 x HDMI 2.0 port1 x DisplayPort1 x RJ-45 port3 x audio jacks


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB Type-C header, with USB 3.2 Gen 1 support1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 header2 x USB 2.0/1.1 headers
Other Connectors: 1 x CPU fan header1 x water cooling CPU fan header3 x system fan headers1 x system fan/water cooling pump header2 x addressable LED strip headers2 x RGB LED strip headers3 x M.2 Socket 3 connectors6 x SATA 6Gb/s connectors1 x front panel header1 x front panel audio header1 x S/PDIF Out header1 x serial port header2 x Thunderbolt add-in card connectors1 x Trusted Platform Module header (For the GC-TPM2.0 SPI/GC-TPM2.0 SPI 2.0 module only)1 x reset button1 x Q-Flash Plus button1 x reset jumper1 x Clear CMOS jumper


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
LED Lighting: RGB
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x 24-pin ATX main power connector2 x 8-pin ATX 12V power connectors


Windows Compatibility
Windows 11: Supported


Features
Features: H/W Monitoring- Voltage detection- Temperature detection- Fan speed detection- Water cooling flow rate detection- Fan fail warning- Fan speed control* Whether the fan (pump) speed control function is supported will depend on the fan (pump) you install.BIOS- 1 x 256 Mbit flash- Use of licensed AMI UEFI BIOS- PnP 1.0a, DMI 2.7, WfM 2.0, SM BIOS 2.7, ACPI 5.0Unique Features- Support for GIGABYTE Control Center (GCC)* Available applications in GCC may vary by motherboard model. Supported functions of each application may also vary depending on motherboard specifications.- Support for Q-Flash- Support for Q-Flash Plus- Support for Smart Backup


Additional Information
Date First Available: October 20, 2022
Label: Board Gigabyte Z790 UD AC
